name: A Sword of Delivery
description:
Armed with only his sword, a lone postman traverses a zombie-infested city to meet the promise of same-day delivery.

As the only living person in a city full of zombies, the postman knows what he must do. Letter after letter, every card will be delivered, every parcel given to those who surely await it...

This game was made for the Mini Game Jam #11 over the course of a weekend. All graphics, code and audio were made during this time. How to play can be found in the main menu.

The  game is meant to be challenging, but  here are a few basic tips:

  • Time your sword swings so that the sword is at the right place at the right time
  • Do not always walk at zombies, retreating or evading them is also good
  • Use cover to block zombie movement
  • When you have been hit ( the screen will go dull and the music will change) try to flee the fight and play carefully
